content.text:
# Battle of Mossy Creek__disambig_1

| place      = Jefferson County, Tennessee
| result      = Union victory
| combatant1  =  United States of America (Union)
| combatant2  =  Confederate States of America
| commander1  = Samuel D. Sturgis
| commander2  = William T. Martin
| units1      = Army of the Ohio  XXIII Corps
| units2      = Martin's Cavalry Brigade
| strength1   =
| strength2   = 2,000
| casualties1 = 151
| casualties2 = Unknown
}}
The Battle of Mossy Creek was a minor battle of the American Civil War, occurring on December 29, 1863, in Jefferson County, Tennessee.
}}
2. Historical Marker, Battle of Mossy Creek, December 29, 1863, Waymarking.com
